channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: Gavin Newsom encourages Floridians to move to California in GOP attack ad. https://t.co/H8zsrhnacS
@Scobleizer You have lawyers!
@DemocraticDaisy @GOPLeader I was looking for that decision and couldn't find it.
The commutative axiom of trolls. People who RT trolls are themselves trolls.
@jerryharrison https://t.co/RzDwv0zh2P
He should be the Attorney General. https://t.co/vgeaPQcZ69

I've never thought I'd get any insights from drawing graph-like pictures of my outlines. I work fast. My outlines are snapshots of what I'm doing in projects on a day by day basis. Others are about communicating with others (reviewers, testers).
Next up the ladder are blog posts. Those are indexed by my outline indexer, daytona. And of course google et al, which care less and less about my public writing, so fuck em.
Finally is the book I've never written which will be a concordance of all the blog writing, w the most intelligent and witty parts up front. If you come up with software for that, I'm a customer. And I don't say that sarcastically, I bet google could do it, if they wanted to.
PS: I forgot to mention twitter which is for public communication of early drafts of stuff that will go on my blog after i've written it here 5 or 10 times. :-)
PPS: I've given up on posting serious shit on FB. Friends I care about post snarky jokes on serious stuff, and that's not fun. FB is for fun only not thought.
"Always cloistered and remote, the court is now impenetrable." https://t.co/5yuTkOS1v0

@kidehen i imagine it'd be different where you are -- but here's what i'm thinking. you try to go to your bank website and you get an error. you try to call someone and there's no dial tone. you check your email but the service isn't there. you search google but it doesn't respond.
@kidehen i've been programming for almost 50 years. i've seen big outages, i've even caused a few via programming errors. but i don't think anyone anywhere has experienced what i described (unless of course your net connection goes down, but that's not what I'm talking about).
I had a dream where the six repub supreme court justices appeared in public naked, to reveal they all had tattoos of Comrade Putin in various places, some with more than others, and larger ones.
Can you imagine what it would be like if one day we all tried to do stuff with computers and nothing worked.

@danmactough there's a lot to be said for saying it directly, but i've also noticed that when you say something that the other person doesn't like, they start telling other people that you're an asshole. so you have to find a balance. ;-)
My Life as a Rolling Stone. https://t.co/qCjj4iNNXV
@BBCRadio2 @RollingStones @BBCiPlayer Can’t you hear me knocking Undercover of the night Gimme shelter And all the rest…
Q: What do Nets fans think about this or that. A: Trick question. There aren't any Nets fans.
@TommyBeer there aren't any nets fans.
Unlicensed marijuana vendors pop up all over NYC as licensed dispensaries wait for the green light to sell recreational weed. https://t.co/NxJjXqWxmO
For now, wary US treads water with transformed COVID-19 | AP News. https://t.co/ufrPn8a8cw

1. peloton 2. swim 3. marguerita 4. garp 5. hot dogs 6. weed 7. conversation 8. mountains 9. pizza
10. life == good
11. Eurythmics
Remember the “people” who annoy you on twitter aren’t actual people, so just block them and get on with it. ❤️
Bruce Katz, Pioneer of the Walking Shoe, Is Dead at 75. https://t.co/xCx0Dc65VF
Google to Delete User Data on Trips to Abortion Clinics. https://t.co/gtSJadrZkr
U.S. Supreme Court asks Maryland to bar protests at justices' homes. https://t.co/vllhB2Wdkk
